Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.

original: induction n. - intros [H1 H2]. subst s2. apply H1. - intros [z [s3 [Hneq [Hstep Hrely]]]]. apply step_coh in Hstep as [Hcoh1 Hcoh2]. apply IHn in Hrely as [Hrely1 Hrely2]. split. ++ apply Hcoh1. ++ apply Hrely2.
